title: A metric learning approach for endoscopic kidney stone identification. (arXiv:2307.07046v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: Several Deep Learning (DL) methods have recently been proposed for an automated identification of kidney stones during an ureteroscopy to enable rapid therapeutic decisions. Even if these DL approaches led to promising results, they are mainly appropriate for kidney stone types for which numerous labelled data are available. However, only few labelled images are available for some rare kidney stone types. This contribution exploits Deep Metric Learning (DML) methods i) to handle such classes with few samples, ii) to generalize well to out of distribution samples, and iii) to cope better with new classes which are added to the database. The proposed Guided Deep Metric Learning approach is based on a novel architecture which was designed to learn data representations in an improved way. The solution was inspired by Few-Shot Learning (FSL) and makes use of a teacher-student approach. translated_title: 一种用于内窥镜肾结石识别的度量学习方法
translated_abstract: 最近提出了几种深度学习（DL）方法用于在输尿管镜检查期间自动识别肾结石，以便快速进行治疗决策。尽管这些DL方法取得了有希望的结果，但它们主要适用于有大量标记数据的肾结石类型。然而，对于一些罕见的肾结石类型，只有很少的标记图像可用。本文利用深度度量学习（DML）方法来处理这些样本稀缺的类别，并且能够很好地推广到分布样本之外，并且对于添加到数据库的新类别能够有更好的应对能力。所提出的引导式深度度量学习方法基于一种新颖的架构，设计了一种更好地学习数据表示的方式。解决方案受到少样本学习（FSL）的启发，并采用了师生模型的方法。师模型（GEMINI）基于已知标签的先验知识生成了一个缩小的假设空间
tldr: 本文提出了一种用于内窥镜肾结石识别的度量学习方法，该方法能够处理样本稀缺类别，并且在推广到新样本以及添加新类别到数据库时能有更好的应对能力
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a metric learning approach for endoscopic kidney stone identification, which can handle classes with few samples and cope better with new samples and added classes in the database.
